name.description: The name of the project. Required for executable generation.

author.description: The name of the author of the project.

version.description: The version of the project,in semantic versioning format, e.g. v1.0.0(-experimental)

mainFile.description: Refers to the path of the main file in the project. If omitted, the compiler will look for a file named "main.sr" in the project root.

root.description: This refers to the path of the project root. If omitted, the compiler will attempt to look for the main file in the current working directory.

allowExternalDependencies.description: Whether to allow external dependencies from the internet or not, e.g. importing directly from GitHub. Disabled by default.

outputPath.description: Path where the output executable will be generated. Defaults to "./build/<executable>"

dependencies.description: A list of external dependencies, either by URL or name. If a name is provided, the compiler will search for them in "./dependencies/<name>"
